alert.note: Alert for Buncombe; Graham; Haywood; Macon; Madison; Northern Jackson; Southern Jackson; Swain; Transylvania (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 01 at 8:21PM EDT until April 02 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT ABOVE 3500 FEET... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT BELOW 3500 FEET... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. For the Wind Advisory, west winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Madison, Swain, Haywood, Buncombe, Graham, Northern Jackson, Macon, Southern Jackson and Transylvania Counties. * WHEN...Until midnight EDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The potential for strong and damaging wind gusts will be greatest across the ridgetops and mountain peaks above 3500 feet in elevation. Wind gusts in valley locations may top out around 55 mph.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Buncombe; Graham; Haywood; Macon; Madison; Northern Jackson; Southern Jackson; Swain; Transylvania
